column4: I receive this error when I put my flash drive in my notebook: "Error mounting: mount exited with exit code 1: helper failed with:
mount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/sdb1,
missing codepage or helper program, or other error
In some cases useful info is found in syslog - try
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
